message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $18,000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Could we possibly meet in the middle?

Bob, I understand your offer, but $10,000 is unfortunately too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $14,000 to make this deal work. This is a fair compromise, and I'm confident you'll still get a great value. What do you think?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I understand your position, I'm still not able to go above $11,000 for the product. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm going to meet you halfway and offer $12,500 for the product.  This is a good deal for both of us, and it's the best I can do at this point.  Let's close this deal and move on!
